PackageOracle.name: DA_BILLING_PROD_INST_INTACT_IT
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_BILLING_PROD_INST_INTACT_IT
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.41.865827000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,billing_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,bus_interact_item_id IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,bus_interact_item_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,billing_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,bus_interact_item_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_billing_prod_inst_intact_it;

body.name: DA_BILLING_PROD_INST_INTACT_IT
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_BILLING_PROD_INST_INTACT_IT
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.41.875930000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,billing_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,bus_interact_item_id IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,bus_interact_item_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_billing_prod_inst_intact_it.add, parms=' || billing_prod_inst_id || '|' || bus_interact_item_id || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || bus_interact_item_type_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_billing_prod_inst_intact_itm a
(
a.billing_prod_inst_id
,a.bus_interact_item_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.bus_interact_item_type_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.billing_prod_inst_id
,add.bus_interact_item_id
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.bus_interact_item_type_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_billing_prod_inst_intact_it.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,billing_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,bus_interact_item_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_billing_prod_inst_intact_it.del, parms=' || billing_prod_inst_id || '|' || bus_interact_item_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_billing_prod_inst_intact_itm a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.billing_prod_inst_id = del.billing_prod_inst_id
AND a.bus_interact_item_id = del.bus_interact_item_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_billing_prod_inst_intact_it.del');

END del;

END da_billing_prod_inst_intact_it;
